service: AWS Partner Central Channel service for managing partner relationships, handshakes, and program management accounts.

operations.AcceptChannelHandshake: Accepts a pending channel handshake request from another AWS account.
operations.CreateChannelHandshake: Creates a new channel handshake request to establish a partnership with another AWS account.
operations.CreateProgramManagementAccount: Creates a new program management account for managing partner relationships.
operations.CreateRelationship: Creates a new partner relationship between accounts.
operations.GetRelationship: Retrieves details of a specific partner relationship.
operations.ListChannelHandshakes: Lists channel handshakes based on specified criteria.
operations.ListProgramManagementAccounts: Lists program management accounts based on specified criteria.
operations.ListRelationships: Lists partner relationships based on specified criteria.
operations.ListTagsForResource: Lists tags associated with a specific resource.
operations.TagResource: Adds or updates tags for a specified resource.
operations.UpdateProgramManagementAccount: Updates the properties of a program management account.
operations.UpdateRelationship: Updates the properties of a partner relationship.

AcceptChannelHandshakeDetail.base: Contains details about an accepted channel handshake.

AccessDeniedException.base: The request was denied due to insufficient permissions.
